channel.title: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap
channel.description:
Ok well on my wallpapere for my client it splits in half. Like instead of it being a picture its a half picture and on my other client it didnt do this, please help i need this really fast im almost done with my game, all i need is that thanks Vhenom
heres a picture [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/a40v21.png[/img]

item.title: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

look at the old picture dimensions and re-size your image using a website like this or this or just google it.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap

item.title: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:9, topic:382181”]well then you’re just going to have to edit the picture, with a photo editing system of some sort.
there isn’t any other way to fix it really.

Okay thank you, do you recommend any?[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap

item.title: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

well then you’re just going to have to edit the picture, with a photo editing system of some sort.
there isn’t any other way to fix it really.

item.title: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Please, don’t call your thread like I need help now!!! or something, specify what you need.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap

item.title: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:6, topic:382181”]there isn’t a way to do that in the files, unless you have some sort of photo editing system.
that is one whole picture, and the reason is it is split in half is because it’s the way the picture was made.
if you want to fix that you’re going to have to change the picture entirely/edit the current.

Noooooooooo the picture is suppose to be made whole i would know because i made it for my client.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap

item.title: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

there isn’t a way to do that in the files, unless you have some sort of photo editing system.
that is one whole picture, and the reason is it is split in half is because it’s the way the picture was made.
if you want to fix that you’re going to have to change the picture entirely/edit the current.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Wallpaper on client Asap
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:4, topic:382181”]I don’t see a thing wrong with this picture, unless you are asking how you can change it?

I dont want to change it i want to make it so it doesn’t make it in half.[/quote]

Read full topic
